question:
Consider the following reports:
  1. Global Innovation Index
  2. Global Competitiveness Index
  3. Ease of doing business index
Which of the above is/are published by the World Bank?
explanation: Global Innovation Index data is released by Cornell University, INSEAD and the World Intellectual Property Organization (WIPO). In 2016 ranking, Switzerland holds the top spot, while China was ranked 25<sup>th</sup> and India at 66<sup>th</sup> position. Global competitiveness index is prepared by the World Economic Forum. India was placed at 39<sup>th</sup> spot in the Global competitiveness index 2016-2017. The ease of doing business index is an index created by the World Bank Group. India ranked 130<sup>th</sup> in the index with Gujarat placed at top spot among Indian states in ease of doing business. Andhra Pradesh holds the second spot.
